column2: "Not bad. But maybe that was too easy, even for a rookie like you."
"Don't go thinking you're something special just because I praised you a little!"
"I'm what's called an ARKS Watcher, and I've had my eye on you. Out of all the ARKS I've seen, I'd say you were about second from the bottom."
"Whenever you want to try and prove yourself, come talk to me."
